p: The therapeutic potential of ar-turmerone has been extensively studied due to its numerous beneficial effects such as anti-inflammatory and cytotoxic effects in the treatment of various neurodegenerative disorders [ 45, 46]. Regarding pest control, ar-turmerone has also been observed to protect against insect and mite infestation; consequently, it has been incorporated into packaging material in order to avoid pest penetration of packaged products [ 47]. Specially, ar-turmerone has been observed to be highly toxic against maize weevil ( Sitophilus zeamais) and fall armyworm ( Spodoptera frugiperda) at low doses [ 48].
